column1: Little Goat Diner////We came during lunch and were seated right away.  Loved the atmosphere
column2: but the service was lacking.  We found ourselves waiving down waiters wherever we could. They weren't coordinating behind the scenes and were bringing out drinks that weren't finished being prepared
column3: which was awkward.  Then when we asked them to bring out valet ticket out
column4: the hostess looked at us like we were nuts.
